cast.name: 埃尔敏·西贾米贾 Ermin Sijamija

awards:
第33届欧洲电影奖(2020)
　　费比西奖 费比西-发现奖(提名)
region: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那
introduction: A full moon night. Hamza, a police inspector, takes his wife to the maternity ward. Her water broke and the doctor orders an urgent delivery. Hamza is worried but he has to leave her – he wasn't able to get the night off. At the police station it seems like the folk tales of the full moon's power are coming true. In the hallway, Hamza meets a boy called Tarik, both a herald of doom and a guardian angel, who will put him on a trial. One by one, the apparitions arrive at the police station.
